about_the_game:
Sole Salvation is a third-person Action-Roguelite driven by a non-linear narrative where you will have to face hordes of enemies with layered and fast-paced combat.

Reach the end of the memory
Travel through the protagonist's haunted memories. Kill hordes of enemies, upgrade your equipment, and advance until you reach the end of the memory, the Sole Salvation.

Unleash the latent power of the Aklo through the armor rings.
Choose and use two types of weapons at the same time; one melee and one ranged. Defend yourself using parries, kinetic force and lightning-fast dodges and strike enemies using physical, critical and elemental damage.

Expand your memories
By recovering your memories, you acquire unique abilities that increase the power and versatility of your melee and ranged weapons. Enhance, alter and fuse your memories to create unpredictable abilities and combos.
